scripts.routegen:format: concurrently -n client,client-seo,server "yarn workspace client prettier --write  'src/routes/**/*.{ts,tsx}'"  "yarn workspace client-seo prettier --write  'src/routes/**/*.{ts,tsx}'" "yarn workspace server prettier --write  'src/libs/routes/**/*.{ts,tsx}'"   -p "[{name} - {time}]" -c "yellow","blue","red"
scripts.routegen:dev: yarn routegen:clean && PRIMARY_DOMAIN=bam.dev yarn workspace route-manager route-codegen --verbose --stacktrace && yarn routegen:format
scripts.routegen:prod: yarn routegen:clean && PRIMARY_DOMAIN=bam.com yarn workspace route-manager route-codegen --verbose --stacktrace && yarn routegen:format
scripts.gqlgen: concurrently -n common,client,client-seo,server "yarn gqlgen:common" "yarn gqlgen:client" "yarn gqlgen:client-seo"  "yarn gqlgen:server" -p "[{name} - {time}]" -c "green","yellow","blue","cyan"
scripts.build: concurrently -n client,client-seo,server-app,server-crons,server-libs "yarn build:client" "yarn build:client-seo" "yarn build:server:app" "yarn build:server:crons" "yarn build:server:libs" -p "[{name} - {time}]" -c "green","yellow","blue","cyan","red"
scripts.format: concurrently -n common,client,client-seo,server "yarn workspace common format" "yarn workspace client format" "yarn workspace client-seo format" "yarn workspace server format" -p "[{name} - {time}]" -c "green","yellow","blue","red"
